Package it.polimi.se2018.model.events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChooseValue  
    DiceSwap
    This class is used to encapsulate the data needed for the action of swapping one Die from the DraftPool with a Die of the RoundTrack.
    DraftPoolUpdate
    Represents a message containing information about the draft pool.
    GameEnd
    The event that updates the view when the game is finished: the final results of the game must be shown to the players.
    GameSetup
    The event that updates the view when a new game starts.
    IncrementDieValue
    This class is used to encapsulate the data needed to perform the action of incrementing or decrementing a drafted Die's value allowed by the ToolCard 'Grozing Pliers'.
    ModelUpdate
    The superclass of all events directed from the model to the view.
    MoveDie
    This class is used to encapsulate the data needed to move an already placed Die on the Player's Pattern.
    MoveTwoDice
    This class is used to encapsulate the data needed to move two dice on the Player's pattern.
    NextTurn
    The event to update the view when the turn of a player is finished, and another player must play it's turn.
    PlaceDie
    This class is used to encapsulate the data needed to place a Die in the Player's Pattern.
    PlayerConnectionStatus
    Event to update views about the change in the connection status of a player.
    PlayerStatus
    Represents a message containing information about a player status, excluded connection status.
    RoundTrackUpdate
    Represents a message containing information about the round track.
    SelectCard
    This class is used to encapsulate the data needed to select a ToolCard that the Player would like to use or to choose his Pattern among their candidates.
    SelectCardSP
    This class is used to encapsulate the data needed to select a ToolCard that the Player would like to use in SinglePlayer mode.
    SelectDie
    This class is used to encapsulate the data needed to select a Die in the DraftPool.
    SelectDifficulty
    This class is used to encapsulate the data needed to select the difficulty level in Solo mode.
    SelectPrivateObjective
    This class is used to encapsulate the data needed to select the PrivateObjectiveCard in Solo mode.
    ViewMessage
    This Class represents the event through which the view(Observable) notifies the controller(Observer) about an action performed by the user.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Action
    This enum contains all the possible actions that a player may want to perform or that he automatically performs in both SinglePlayer mode and MultiPlayer mode.
    ModelEvent
    This enum represent the possible types of model updates.
